lead_paragraph: Matt Lauer found himself besieged by critics of all political stripes, who accused him of unfairness, sloppiness and even sexism in his handling of the event.

headline.print_headline: Moderator of Clinton-Trump Forum Fields a Storm of Criticism
headline.main: Matt Lauer Fields Storm of Criticism Over Clinton-Trump Forum

snippet: Matt Lauer found himself besieged by critics of all political stripes, who accused him of unfairness, sloppiness and even sexism in his handling of the event....
abstract: News Analysis; critics say television journalist Matt Lauer missed his chance to prove his broadcasting mettle as overseer of live prime-time forum with presidential candidates; complain NBC Today show host rushed Hillary Clinton, and failed to challenge incorrect assertions by Donald J Trump, even allowing him to get away with non-answers; criticism highlights media's inconsistent handling of two nominees.
